name: CreateList
description: Creates a new list with an optional set of initial items

list.description: The name of the list to create
The name of the list to delete

name: AddItem
description: Adds one item to a list

list.description: The name of the list to add the item to

item.description: The item to add to the list

name: RemoveItem
description: Removes one item from a list

list.description: The name of the list to remove the item from

items.description: The item to remove from the list
